text: Simona Stoyanova (; born 28 March 2004) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Women's National Championship club FC Etar Veliko Tarnovo and the Bulgaria women's national team. ==International career== Stoyanova capped for Bulgaria at senior level in a 0–6 friendly loss to Croatia on 14 June 2019. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Bulgarian women's footballers Category:Bulgaria women's international footballers
title: Simona Stoyanova
